summary: This document is an email from July 26, 2018, providing instructions regarding a work order and expenditure for a NICE upgrade/replacement project. It indicates financial thresholds requiring specific approvals and includes attached sample documents and instructions.

events.title: Instructions for NICE Upgrade/Replacement Project
events.description: An email was sent providing instructions, samples, and documentation requirements for a work order and expenditure related to a NICE upgrade/replacement project, noting specific financial thresholds.

keyFacts: A work order over $10,000 and an expenditure over $25,000 were required for a NICE upgrade/replacement project.
The communication occurred on July 26, 2018, via email with several attached documents.
The document references standard financial approval procedures for a technology upgrade project.
